group_1.textRight: You're too good at cards… So now what,@is there a punishment game?

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* I know you lost on purpose,@so I'm giving you something special...

group_1.textRight: Dunno what you're talking about… But whatever@punishment you come up with is fine.

group_1.textLeft: Then do the bamboo shoot dance.

group_1.textRight: Oh hey, it's time for us to go.
No, it really is time… The people who live here@are coming back.

group_1.textLeft: The ones you made travel by suggestion?@But we only got here two days ago!

group_1.textRight: 'Fraid I can't keep them away from here@for too long.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm… I'll keep that in mind.

group_1.textRight: Anyway, let's go Sena.@We're off to the next town.

group_1.narration: After our money ran out,@we've been moving north by foot.
Whenever we get tired of walking, we drop into a@nearby town and borrow a house via suggestion…@Repeating that as we travel through towns.
But it might be time for me to pick up some work@in a town somewhere and save up some money.@Then we can ride the train, and I can buy Hanna@anything and everything she wants.
Right, like a Christmas present…@A Christmas present for Hanna so we@can spend a happy Christmas together.

group_1.textCenter: Except I can't get hired anywhere…

group_1.narration: I couldn't even manage an interview@because I can't reveal my identity,@and I can't even prepare a resume.
I don't know what to do…@It's supposed to be our Christmas together,@but it'll be so disappointing if I can't even@manage to give her a single present…
I only have just a little over a hundred yen now…@Enough for one person to travel to one station…@I can't get her a gift with that kind of money.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, by the way…@I bought this to thank you for the diary…

group_1.narration: Yes, I can't afford two pens…@But I can afford one for Hanna…
Hers was purple with a star design…@Good. I can still remember that well.
I'll give her a pen filled with memories.@*Giggle* That'll make her happy for sure!

group_1.textRight: I was looking around for you.@What're you doing here?

group_1.textLeft: I was just thinking about some things…@How was your day, Hanna?

group_1.textRight: I got us a house. Oh, and…
I was nosing around town when a florist gave@it to me.
I'm not big on flowers, so I figured I'd give@them to you.

group_1.textLeft: Th-thank you… I like flowers, so this makes@me really happy…
…Flowers that bloom when the snow melts.

group_1.textRight: Wait, so it's out of season?@[chara:301801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:301801:lipSynch_1][chara:301801:cheek_0][chara:301801:face_mtn_ex_000.exp3.json]No, if you plant it right, it'll be fine.

group_1.textLeft: …Hey, Hanna.@Let's get out of this town right away.

group_1.textRight: Alright, we'll leave as soon as we can.
But…it's already so late, so let's sleep where@I set us up, alright?

group_1.narration: I felt so pathetic that@Hanna is handling things so well.@I wonder what's wrong with me…
I have to find my present soon…@But it wasn't in this town…was it? Wasn't it?@I mean…what was I even doing in this town?
―Hanna―@Sena, wait!@Don't leave me behind.
―Mikoto―@Eh…?@It's…evening already…?
―Mikoto―@...What have I been doing for all this time…?
―Hanna―@Doesn't matter…@You okay, Sena?
―Mikoto―@Y-yeah, I'm fine…@Maybe I'm a little sleep-deprived?
―Mikoto―@...Well, since we're here, we might as well@plant those snowdrop seeds.
―Hanna―@Here?
―Mikoto―@After the snow melts and everything disappears,@if those flowers bloom along the path we took…
―Mikoto―@...Wouldn't that be lovely?
And so we continued to flee further and@further north, sowing our seeds,
believing in our dream that if we can find@a place where there's no one else around,@we can be happy.
